name: Fees; disposition
text: §465-12  Fees; disposition.  Application, examination, license, renewal, and temporary permit fees required by this chapter, none of which are refundable, shall be as provided in rules adopted by the director pursuant to chapter 91. [L 1967, c 290, pt of §1; HRS §465-12; am L 1975, c 118, §29(3); am L 1976, c 97, §1; am L 1978, c 59, §1; am L 1982, c 204, §8; am L 1983, c 124, §17 and c 136, §5; am L 1984, c 7, §73; am L 1985, c 115, §13; am L 1992, c 202, §160]
